Articles.Content:
Inspired by Narcosis's superlight I was messing around in the SPH and came up with a siamese twin version.

Not as finely crafted as his but I thought I would show it anyways.

http://www./view/ss1cnbi56kafrv7/2_seater_mini_ssto.craft

Javascript is disabled. View full album

For kerbals to get in and out you just close front landing gear.

Twin turbos are overkill and you have to watch your fuel but it makes orbit very fast and easy.

Circularize and deorbit with rcs.

Edited February 25, 2014 by Pauly
Added video

Inspired by Narcosis's superlight I was messing around in the SPH and came up with a siamese twin version.

Not as finely crafted as his but I thought I would show it anyways.

Not as finely crafted? I think you're being too modest. That's a very polished-looking little SSTO you've built, though I may be biased

I'll make sure to take this out for a test run when I get some free time.
Looks really good, I'm always amazed and fascinated my micro engineering. Keep it up!
Thanks guys I will try to get the craft file uploaded when I get home.
